verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Great and marvelous
are Your works
Lord God Almighty
Just and true
are Your ways
Oh Lord the King of ages
Who shall not fear You
oh Lord
And glorify Your name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For You alone are holy
For You alone are holy
For You alone are holy
Almighty God
